content.p: Accredited by the British Council for the teaching of English in the UK. The Centre for English Language Education helps develop your academic skills and language before you start university, preparing you for the demands of academic study in a range of disciplines at all levels. We also offer academic language and communication skills support during your studies. Take your academic and language skills to the level required for your degree. Continue to develop your academic skills while studying your degree. Online study is available for our pre-sessional English for Academic Purposes courses. Students taking an online course will not need to travel to the UK. These modules are available to students studying particular courses, to enhance language skills and develop specialist knowledge that is relevant to your degree. The Centre for English Language Education team has colleagues from many different countries, many of whom are multilingual and are experts in English language teaching. We are accredited by the British Council for the teaching of English in the UK, which ensures high-quality teaching, facilities and support. Our strengths were recognised in course design, quality management, learning resources and the experience, skills and knowledge of our teaching team. We are also a member of English UK, the national membership association of accredited English language teaching (ELT) centres in the UK. Join us on Weibo School of Education Facebook School of Education X (formerly Twitter)
